citations.narrative:
The facility currently does not have inventory records for the 29 animals on hand.
Not having current inventory records does not ensure proper tracking of the animals.
The licensee must create and maintain records that correctly disclose all the required information for animals
purchased, owned, held, leased, or otherwise within possession.
Correct By: From this day forward
Inspection and exit interview conducted with zookeeper.
